title: Fast Build Config
description: This file contains author name, min_sdk, dependencies, assets, and various build configurations. It also includes support for Kotlin, Java 8 features, and optimization settings.

author.title: Developer Name
author.description: This extension developer name will be included with the components_build_info.json.

min_sdk.title: Android minimum SDK API Level
min_sdk.description: The minimum version number of the Android SDK the extension needs in order to function properly. This MUST be greater than or equal to `7`.

compile_sdk.title: Android compile SDK API Level
compile_sdk.description: Define the compile Android SDK API level.

proguard.title: ProGuard
proguard.description: If enabled, extension will be optimized using ProGuard.

R8.title: R8
R8.description: If enabled, extension will be optimized using R8.

collect_rules.title: Collect ProGuard Rules
collect_rules.description: Enable to collect ProGuard/R8 rules from runtime AARs

kotlin.title: Kotlin Support
kotlin.description: If enabled, Kotlin Standard Libraries will be included with the extension.

kotlin_version.title: Kotlin Compiler version
kotlin_version.description: Set the version of kotlin-compiler. NOTE: Run `fast sync` command before building the extension.

desugar_sources.title: Desugaring Sources
desugar_sources.description: Enable to desugar extension's source code.

desugar_dex.title: Desugaring DEX
desugar_dex.description: If enabled, the D8 tool will generate desugared jar (classes.dex). If R8 also enabled with it, so the R8 shriker will generate desugared jar.

resolver.title: Resolver Tool
resolver.description: Select resolver tool between `gradle/maven` to fetch transitive dependencies.

repositories.title: Remote Repositories
repositories.description: Default repositories are Maven Central, Google Maven & Maven Local. If the library you want to use is not available in these repositories, add here by specifying their URLs.

dependencies.title: Runtime dependencies
dependencies.description: Runtime dependencies [Remote and Local]. NOTE: Run `fast sync` command before building the extension when you're using local .aar or any remote dependencies.

compile_time.title: Compile-time dependencies
compile_time.description: Compile-time dependencies [Remote and Local]. NOTE: Run `fast sync` command before building the extension when you're using local .aar or any remote dependencies.

excludes.title: Exclusions dependencies
excludes.description: Define dependencies to skip during resolve. [Remote only]. NOTE: Run `fast sync` command before building the extension.

assets.title: Extension assets
assets.description: Should be present into assets directory.

xmls.title: Attach custom XML
xmls.description: Attach custom XML to bundle it with APK. It should be present into assets directory within relative child directory.

aars.title: Attach AARs Libraries
aars.description: Define AAR libraries to attach with extension. [Remote and Local]. NOTE: Remote libraries should be resolved as runtime or compile-time dependencies.

gen_docs.title: Docs Generator
gen_docs.description: Enable to write docs in Markdown during build. It also generate blocks as PNG for App Inventor, Kodular, Niotron and AndroidBuilder. Pass `-b` as an additional argument to trigger the Docs Generator.

shadow_blocks.title: Shadow Generator
shadow_blocks.description: Enable to generate blocks with shadow blocks. NOTE: Blocks generator should be enabled.

auto_version.title: Auto-increment version
auto_version.description: Enable to increment the version number of each component during build.

deannonate.title: De-annotate
deannonate.description: Enable to remove @annotations from the extension.

filter_mit_classes.title: Filer MIT App Inventor Classes
filter_mit_classes.description: Enable to skip matching classes provided by AI2.

mock_js.title: Mock JS for each Component.
mock_js.description: The file name should be like `ComponentName.mock.js`. It should be present into assets directory. [Upcoming feature]

mock_css.title: Mock Css for each Component.
mock_css.description: The file name should be like `ComponentName.mock.css`. It should be present into assets directory. [Upcoming feature]
